title: Analysis | Trump’s claim that immigrants bring ‘tremendous crime’ is still wrong
subtitle: Trump has insisted for years that immigrants raise crime rates, but new studies show he's still wrong.
author: www.washingtonpost.com
vclaim: “Is the ACS doing a good job of capturing the foreign-born? It didn’t in the past,” said Steven A. Camarota, the research director at the Center for Immigration Studies, which has documented several issues with the quality of Census data on immigrant prisoners. “The question is, How good is it now? … What I can say is that the incarceration data in the ACS looks more consistent over time, but that sometimes means it could be consistently undercounting.”
